Header: Discussions are in progress on Makandure Madush
Content: The Police headquarters announces that discussions are being ensued to act on underworld leader Makandure Madush who was arrested in Dubai. Makandure Madush and 25 other suspects were arrested in a super luxury hotel in Dubai yesterday with cocaine. It is reported that a diplomatic passport holder is also among the suspects arrested. Discussions are being held to bring the arrested people to Sri Lanka. The Ministry of Defence and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs have already opened discussions with the Dubai government at diplomatic level. A team from the STF has also joined the operation to nab the criminals. A debate has been initiated whether the arrested individuals should be dealt under the Sri Lanka’s law or Dubai’s law. State Minister of Defence Ruwan Wijewardena says discussions are being held in Dubai authorities to bring Madush and other suspects to Sri Lanka. Meanwhile, parliamentarian Harshana Rajakaruna said that as the government has ensured law and order in the country criminals like Makandure Madush have been able to netted.
